lead_paragraph: Rafael Esquivel, the former president of Venezuela’s soccer federation, has agreed to be extradited from Switzerland to the United States to face corruption charges, a Swiss justice official said.

headline.main: Rafael Esquivel Agrees to U.S. Extradition

snippet: Rafael Esquivel, the former president of Venezuela’s soccer federation, has agreed to be extradited from Switzerland to the United States to face corruption charges, a Swiss justice official said.
abstract: Former Venezuelan soccer federation president Rafael Esquivel agrees to be extradited from Switzerland to United States to face corruption charges in FIFA investigation; other soccer news noted.
